processingCommand.script:
:DEFINE &AURLS#, string, 2
:DEFINE &ASDRS#, string, 2

:PRINT "Get APP servers"
:SET &DB_VARA# = GET_VAR(CONFIG.DR-NTV.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "AFSM_DB_VARA", 1)

:SET &WMS_USERNAME# = ""
:SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &WMS_PORT# = ""

:SET &EMS_USERNAME# = ""
:SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &EMS_PORT# = ""

:SET &REFS_USERNAME# = ""
:SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &REFS_PORT# = ""

:SET &RW_USERNAME# = ""
:SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# = ""
:SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# = ""
:SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = ""
:SET &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = ""
:SET &RW_PORT# = ""

:SET &SEQ_HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&DB_VARA#)
:PROCESS &SEQ_HND#
:  SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&SEQ_HND#, 1)
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-WMS"
:        SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &WMS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &WMS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-EMS"
:        SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &EMS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &EMS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-REFS"
:        SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &REFS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &REFS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-RW"
:        SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &RW_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &RW_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-WMS/FAIL"
:        SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &WMS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &WMS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-EMS/FAIL"
:        SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &EMS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &EMS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-REFS/FAIL"
:        SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &REFS_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &REFS_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:    CASE &KEY# = "&INSTANCE_NAME#-RW/FAIL"
:        SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 1)
:        SET &RW_PORT# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 2)
:        SET &RW_USERNAME# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 3)
:        SET &URLS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 4)
:        FILL &AURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URLS#, ",")
:        SET &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL# = &AURLS#[1]
:        SET &SDRS# = GET_VAR(&DB_VARA#, &KEY#, 5)
:        FILL &ASDRS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&SDRS#, ",")
:        SET &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN# = &ASDRS#[1]
:  ENDSWITCH
:ENDPROCESS

:PUBLISH &WMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_PORT#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &EMS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_PORT#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &REFS_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_PORT#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &RW_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
